meanings.definition: To express gratitude or appreciation to someone.
meanings.sent1: I bethanked my friend for helping me with my homework.
meanings.sent2: She always bethanked her parents for their love and support.
meanings.sent3: The cat bethanked the mouse for leading it to the cheese.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bethanked the sun for shining brightly and helping them grow.
meanings.sent5: The student bethanked the teacher for explaining the difficult concept clearly.

meanings.definition: To be grateful or thankful for something.
meanings.sent1: We bethanked the kind stranger for returning my lost wallet.
meanings.sent2: He bethanked his lucky stars for winning the lottery.
meanings.sent3: The dog bethanked the mailman for bringing treats every day.
meanings.sent4: The tree bethanked the rain for quenching its thirst during the dry season.
meanings.sent5: She bethanked the universe for bringing her long-lost friend back into her life.
